about.title: Your vision, our craft
about.description: Learn about the story behind Kalmar Studio and our passion for printing and design.
about.historyText1: Founded in 2005, Kalmar Studio has grown from a small print shop to a full-service printing and design studio serving clients across Sweden and beyond.
about.historyText2: Our team of experienced designers and print specialists are dedicated to delivering exceptional quality and service for every project, big or small.

testimonials.title: What our clients say
testimonials.description: Don't just take our word for it - hear what our valued customers have to say about our services.

items.quote: The quality of the print exceeded our expectations. The customer service was exceptional from start to finish.
items.author: Sarah Johnson

items.quote: Fast delivery and impeccable design work. Kalmar Studio helped us rebrand our entire visual identity.
items.author: Michael Brown

items.quote: As a small business owner, I appreciate their personal touch and attention to detail. Highly recommended!
items.author: Emma Wilson
